artist: Painter: After Jan van Goyen; Engraver: Francis Vivares
description: river front with ruined tower left foreground; staircase left of tower with dog at bottom of stairs; 3 fishing boats one pulling in net; village, pier and sailing boats in center distance
inscription:

below image in black: [Van Goyen pinx\'t   F. Vivares Sculp/ The Dutch Fishermen/ Done from an Original Picture in the Collection of Mr. Poyner of Islington.  Published according to Act of Parliament July 16, 1756]; on sheet in pencil: [1-492];  on verso in pencil: [188/ Mr Goddard]
title: The Dutch Fishermen
